package.name: python_orocos_kdl
package.description:
The 'python_orocos_kdl' package is deprecated and is being replaced by the 'pykdl' package starting in ROS Hydromedusa. The only difference between these two packages is the name.
Python bindings for the Orocos Kinematics and Dynamics Library (KDL).
package.author: Ruben Smits

export.deprecated: The 'python_orocos_kdl' package is deprecated and is being replaced by the 'pykdl' package starting in ROS Hydromedusa. The only difference between these two packages is the name.
